title: Why do the CD player start skipping the songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Either the CDs are scratched or the CD lazer lens needs cleaning. Buy a CD cleaner & CD cleaning fluid - This is a CD with a little brush that you play like CD and it cleans the CD Lens. CD Lens Cleaner | maplin Check the CD for scratches or finger prints - clean the CD from inner circle to outer rim in straight movements i.e. do not clean in circular clockwise or anti clockwise movements as that's the direction the CD moves towards the laser. Play CD, see if it works or plays on other CD players. IF it's not too badly scratched you MAY be able to repair with a CD repair kit, again buy on line. The Top 3 CD/DVD Repair Kits on the Market If none of the above works then create art and recycle your old scratched cds 17 DIY Ways TO Recuse Old CDs
